roleset.name: support protectively
roleset.note: CRADLE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from cradle.01-v)

example.name: passive, arg1
example.text: Alex entered first and was followed [*-2] by the doctor who , for all his care, [*T*-3]manifested a perceptible bulge on his left side where [the hen]-1 was cradled [*-1] [*T*-4] .
